# DatePicker disabled 样式在 Form 下消失

`4.x`,`unconfirmed`

### Reproduction link

[https://stackblitz.com/edit/react-eevocz?file=demo.tsx](https://stackblitz.com/edit/react-eevocz?file=demo.tsx)

### Steps to reproduce

1. 点击提交
2. 鼠标 hover 到 DatePicker 内

### What is expected?

disabled 保持不变

### What is actually happening?

disabled 样式失效

| ----------- | ------- |
| antd        | 4.24.14 |
| React       | latest  |
| System      | mac     |
| Browser     | chrome  |
